repository_metadata.notes:
The electoral data repository is a compilation of raw data of the elections since 1945 facing researchers, media and the general public who are interested in analyzing the data of voters, candidates, results and accountability of elections.

All files are provided in "txt" format and can be imported into any statistical software, database or spreadsheet. Any query, filter or crossover is the responsibility of the researcher.

It is important to read the instruction file that comes with tables and pay attention to the date of generation of the file in order to make imports and queries appropriately.

The individuals interviewed include business men and women, scientists, authors, actors and other people in the media talking about their lives and motivations. The archive provides a useful social commentary.

name.name: Desert Island Discs: Castaway Archive and Podcasts

repository_metadata.notes: The films cover different genres like newsreels, documentaries, fiction and propaganda and have to be considered of special importance since only around 20% of the complete silent film production survived in the film heritage institutions. Therefore, the films searchable through the European Film Gateway constitute a crucial part of these remaining moving image records.

organisation.notes:
"CREST Collections" has moved from being a single repository for it's memeber open access research outputs to a multi-tenant collection of repositories for each of its member institutions. If you would like to harvest the open access data from these repositories please see below for the distinct OAI-PMH interfaces of each:

Bishop Grosseteste University: https://bgro.repository.guildhe.ac.uk/cgi/oai2
